review: Not my favorite. I ordered this stick because I always had great experiences with Amazon. This has definitely fallen well below the average experience. I constantly have network interruptions. I even quadrupled my network speed to accommodate. It hasn't made anything better. I tried calling customer service twice, and both times got awful service. I was told multiple times that it was my connection speed. My phone, tablet, and gaming system all get excellent service in the same location. Since talking to customer service, I have removed the gaming devices and turn off the wifi on my phone when ever I am watching the fire stick. I still have issues. Not sure if there is anything more I can do. I recently got the roku box and don't have any issues with the connection.

review: For people who only watch stuff on Amazon Prime, it's fine but I love Netflix and it will not work well with Netflix. Very frustrating. Also, if you are trying to eliminate cable/dish then the apps, like A&E;, are useless as they make you enter a code that has to be verified by a cable or dish company. Completely ridiculous!! I would have given it fewer stars but I got in on the introductory price so it's getting an extra star since I didn't pay full price.
